Room.Name: South Beach
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a beach popular with tourists and students from the University.
Room.LongDescription: Students from the Iilandi University like to party here on weekends, and there are several fire rings on the beach which look recently used. There are also a couple of empty beer kegs in sight. The white sand is dazzling during the day, and at night it sparkles in the moonlight. Tourists say it is one of the nicest beaches on the coast of Mordor.
